overview: At dinner his adulterous affair with Virginia Klinger comes to light, and it is seen how he responds to Montalvo's letter with a blunt sarcasm of his physical condition. After all this, General Ayarza, who arrived at the place, upset García Moreno, who left dinner and left the place.
tagline: Based on the novel by Alicia Yánez Cossío
title: I know they come to kill me
